0.1.name: wordpress/wp-list-sub-pages
0.1.description: This Wordpress plugin is oly one function. It takes exactly the same parameters as wp_list_pages, except for child_of, which is used internally. When called on in template file, it will list : * on the homepage of the blog, every page and subpage (default, this can be overriden by parameters) * on every other page, only the pages with the same top-parent (parent of level 1)
